website_summaries.verdict: Mid-cut ladies' waterproof boot with seam-sealed construction featuring lace-up vamp and embossed logo at side shaft.
pros: Rugged elegance with Herringbone texture outsole for traction
Moisture absorbent cotton lining keeps feet comfortable
cons: Sizing runs small, best to order a full size up for fit

customer_reviews.title: Super cute Sorel Out n About boots
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boots and the style they add to my outfits. I bought them for daily use while running errands in less than perfect weather. They aren’t very warm but they do keep my feet dry in the rain. I normally wear a 9, 9.5 or a 10 depending on the shoe so after reading other reviews about size I decided to go with a 9.5 and I am so glad I did because they fit me perfectly. I’ve worn them with heavy wool socks and light weight ankle socks and always experienced a great fit. I would recommend these stylish boots to others.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon F.

customer_reviews.title: A Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a pair of Sorel Out N About Boots without ties, and needed to replace them. I had difficulty finding the same design in my size, so settled on this version with laces. While I like them, the opening for your foot to slide in is much more narrow than the slip-ons, so they are not as convenient to slip on quickly. And, because of the height and narrow opening, tall socks are necessary or they rub. Still satisfied with the purchase, although I will continue to look for my preferred original version.
customer_reviews.author: NYShopper

customer_reviews.title: Love love these boots!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been stalking these boots for awhile and finally decided on them when they were on sale! I love Sorel boots and these are do not disappoint! I ordered a half size up (as I normally do with any boot) and they fit perfectly. I have a wide foot with a very high arch and the support in these is great and feels comfortable to wear all day walking around! They also do a great job at keeping my feet warm and dry even in the cold North Eastern winter. I definitely receive compliments everytime I wear these!
customer_reviews.author: Kw16

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfortable, keep feet dry and warm.
customer_reviews.text: Usually wear size 9 but bought size 9.5 per suggested reviews and fit perfectly even with thick wool socks. I find them to be quite comfortable, they don't feel like a typical bulky winter boot. I wanted these boots for those winter days when the snow has been plowed but it's still cold/wet out, making these a perfect alternative to wearing mid calf snow boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These boots are super cute but run on the small side
customer_reviews.text: These boots are super cute but run on the small side. I usually wear a size 8-8.5 but ended up getting these in a size 9. I have another pair of sorel boots (the "Joan of Arctic" style) and these definitely run smaller. I would suggest wearing thicker socks with these because they are a little stiff along the top and kind of dig into my ankles. They can't really be tightened at all even though they have laces. Overall I'm happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Nice, runs small.
customer_reviews.text: I like these boots. I will say they do run a bit small. I ordered a women’s 9 (same size as other boots I have by the same brand that fit well) and they are snug. They will do fine with a lightweight sock or tights which is what they will be worn with as mostly I’ll use these for commuting in wet weather but there is no chance I’ll be wearing them with any warm heavy socks. Go up a size if you intend on that for sure. Probably not gonna keep you very warm withough a heavy sock in colder temps.
customer_reviews.author: Linsey Mac

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so cute, and warm too! Perfect for days in Michigan when you don’t know if it will rain or snow and salt covers the roads. I love the height and, despite the laces, they are easy to slide on and off. I am usually a 9.5 or 10 and the 10 fits well. These are definitely more comfortable when worn with thicker, taller socks. When worn with short socks, they do rub a bit. I’m hoping that will go away after a few more wears, but I mostly wear them with taller socks.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Milham

customer_reviews.title: Runs small!  Order full size up!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots but they run small. I wish I had purchased a 10.5 I can wear the 10, but, only with thin socks. I read all the reviews and thought a 10 would be ok. Info for reference: I am a 9/9.5 in heels and other flat shoes. I'm a 10 in running sneakers. Four stars because the product doesn't give enough information about how to account for their product made differently (small) and to account for that. Otherwise good quality shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L. P.

customer_reviews.title: 5) to fit comfortably with socks
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9.5 or 10, depending on the shoes, but you would need a half size bigger (I would need a 10.5) to fit comfortably with socks! The two star rating isn’t about the boots! They are very nice... even though the third pair I ordered were two different sizes! The service was a fiasco! Too long to explain! First time I have ever had this problem with Amazon! Waiting for three credits to my credit card!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Go a size up. You’ll be happy you did!
customer_reviews.text: Please please please if you buy these make sure you go a full size up. Love the leather, quality is great but they are very small I’m a 9.5 women’s and need a full 10.5 and have had to return 2x. Currently in the return process to see if the 10.5 works.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots!! I read the reviews about them running small. This was not the case for me. I’m a 9 1/2 and I purchased a 9 1/2 and they fit perfectly! I would even say I have a wider foot than most, hopefully this review helps anyone on the fence about sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Miller

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so in love with the boots! They are super comfortable and didn’t need any breaking in...yes, of course you wear thicker socks covering your ankles for comfort (and style), don’t see why you’d want to wear them any other way! I have wear a size 10 and was worried they would make my feet look more rediculously large than they already are, but they really don’t! Seem super quality and like they will hold up well, but I’ve only been wearing them for a month.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Keary

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for mucking around in the rain and short ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for mucking around in the rain and short bursts in freezing temps/snow. They run a little large but not so bad as the actual sorel snow boots. I may consider getting the pull-on version of these I love them so.
customer_reviews.author: Hill Yeah

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable & Up-size
customer_reviews.text: First of all, you’ll need to order a whole size up. Secondly, these are VERY uncomfortable on the ankle. Not only does the unlined fabric rub off your skin if it’s touching bare skin, but the cut digs into your ankle, even if you have socks to cover it. It was so bad, I contemplated having somebody bring me a different pair of shoes to work because these ones were so painful. I will say though, the Plus version of these are amazing and worth the extra cash.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof boots!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a boot that would be thinner than some other SOREL products and that would keep my feet dry with melting snow and ice. This product does fulfill my needs. The 10 woman's size was a bit large but still works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Addeline Theis

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of bean boots that I rarely wear because they feel so heavy and clunky. I also had to order a wide 9 because the regular was way too narrow and they felt extremely uncomfortable. I ordered these in a 9.5 and they are perfect! They feel more like sneakers than boots, and they're super light weight! I would recommend these to anyone looking for a great rain or trail boot.The leather is beautiful and they are easy to get on and off! If you are considering these for snow, I would order up a half size to accommodate thicker socks, because they definitely aren't built for warmth. (Perfect for rainy Tennessee mountain weather, though!)
customer_reviews.author: FlowerChild210

customer_reviews.title: Size up!
customer_reviews.text: Order one whole size up!! After I did that, they fit and look great. I wear them almost everyday here in the PNW! As long as I wear socks (the thickness doesn't matter), then the leather doesn't rub.
customer_reviews.author: sbaker

customer_reviews.title: Quality boot
customer_reviews.text: I’ve read a lot about how small these ran. I’m normally a 9 or 9 1/2. After contemplating what size to get, I went with a 10. They are actually a little big but work with thicker socks. They are very comfortable and would definitely recommend them. I really like Sorel and they make quality footwear. I’ve had the Caribou snow boot for 5 years and they still look great. I think it’s worth spending a little more if they last.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie B

customer_reviews.title: order up
customer_reviews.text: Other snow boots I have purchased use sizing that accommodates thick winter socks. Not the case with these....order up. They are cute though, and probably would have been comfy in the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Ems

customer_reviews.title: Great boot for Spring, Summer and Fall
customer_reviews.text: I wear this boot everyday! I normally wear a size 9.5 and when I first received this item in a 10 it felt small. But after wearing for a week it felt great. I now wear this book everyday to walk my daughter to school. Great boot for Spring, Summer and Fall!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie K

customer_reviews.title: Definitely order up a size or two, but great boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are really great- I followed the advice of the other reviewers and ordered wayyy larger than usual (normally I fit in an 8 1/2, I ordered a 10!). They fit perfectly, and I have enough room to wear my thick flannel socks when it snows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: from a normal 9 to a 9 1/2 and they were perfect! I wore them for a week traveling in ...
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully I followed the reviews and went for bigger size, from a normal 9 to a 9 1/2 and they were perfect! I wore them for a week traveling in Iceland, with no blisters, and warm, happy feet!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lil' boot!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boot's. I have bought two pairs over the past two years and they're my go to shoes! I love that they're waterproof. I live in the city so I didn't need a big bulky boot to tread through snow, just something that will get me through the slush and a bit of snow. Keeps my toes nice and warm! LOVE LOVE LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: michaela

customer_reviews.title: not the best Sorels out there
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get your foot in, but then it's really wide once your foot is in them. Returned, not the best Sorels out there.
customer_reviews.author: lnkmom

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: These are great looking shoes and I was really looking forward to trying them, but they run incredibly small. I typically wear a 9 - 9.5, but ordered a 10 to allow for thick winter socks. These are the smallest size 10 I've ever tried on! They felt more like an 8, so I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Karon

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and easy to wear for long periods of time!! I wish they were easier to get on and off
customer_reviews.author: April Pozek

customer_reviews.title: Super well made and Really liked them
customer_reviews.text: Super well made and Really liked them. Really snug so no room for socks--Have to return. Cant Exchange. Must attain acception email from shoe ware house to return from. Kind of a rude lot to go through to simply return.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Overton

customer_reviews.title: ... but once I broke them in they are now perfect! Just be patient
customer_reviews.text: They were a little tight on my toes but once I broke them in they are now perfect! Just be patient...They're worth it
customer_reviews.author: Jennie m

customer_reviews.title: Trendy Fall shoes
customer_reviews.text: Wore thend all fall and winter. Appropriate for most occasions. I even twisted the ends of the laces 'old school style'. Please keep making trendy shoes like this.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: These are PERFECT for slushing my way through the Chicago winter
customer_reviews.text: These are PERFECT for slushing my way through the Chicago winter. Fits true to size! Warm and dry without getting too hot and sweaty when I go into buildings!
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Order up a full size!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, can't waitvtobwear them, but had to size up a FULL size. I am a true 9 and I ordered a 10, they fit perfectly, a 9.5 would have been too small.
customer_reviews.author: Awesome Mom to 2

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, ordered a half size up, as site said they run small. First time I wore them walked 9 miles in sleet, and feet were warm and dry. They look good enough to wear them to town.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: I loved the way these looked. I read these ran small so I ordered up 1/2 size. What you need to know is the boot only opens so far. I have a high instep so I could not fit my foot into the boot. I loosened the strings as loose as I could too.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Ikenberry

customer_reviews.title: I purchased a 10 through REI website & got them ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a 10 through REI website & got them about $40 cheaper. The half size bigger was just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: AshB

customer_reviews.title: Way too small!!
customer_reviews.text: I could not even get my feet in these boots. I normally wear a 9.5 or 10. I ordered a 10 M and the boots were so small that I could not even get my feet into the boots.
customer_reviews.author: C Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!!! I usually wear a 9.5 but exchanged for a 10. They are a lil roomy but i love them. Pretty warm too, non slip, good buy!
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter Alex loves them, she had to do a size up, run a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order a half size up. Also, there were ...
customer_reviews.text: Order a half size up. Also, there were two insoles inside of each boot.... not sure if this is normal but I almost returned them before I realized why they were tight. Still, they run small.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Christen

customer_reviews.title: I want A replacement
customer_reviews.text: It broke it less than two month, with only using it for 5 times. Please I want replacement
customer_reviews.author: Maria L.

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boot! They are my go to in the fall and winter. I’m from Michigan and pair these with thick camp socks to keep my feet warm in the harsh winter. I purchased my size and it was a true fit.
customer_reviews.author: sls19

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Comforatble, Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I am a 9-9.5, I ordered a 9.5 and I had enough room to wear them with thick socks - they aren't too loose with thin socks. Leather is stiff at first but will soften up after time.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Order your sneaker size!
customer_reviews.text: I went with the reviews and I bought my usual athletic shoe size, which is a half size up from my normal shoe size. They fit great, even with thick wool socks.They are comfortable and lightweight and will be great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Cox

customer_reviews.title: perfect shoe for the rain
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoe, it is super comfortable. I read the reviews and went a size up, it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Love these booties but order a 1/2 size up from ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these booties but order a 1/2 size up from normal size. I am a 9 and got a 9 1/2 and they fit perfect. Got these for a recent trip to Tahoe and they were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ponell Millar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love them, they look great, it would be great if they had a warmer insole
customer_reviews.author: claudia valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and cracks easily.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted one season before the plastic split in three places. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Arnold

customer_reviews.title: My new fall and winter favorites!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect right out of the box. I wear a 9.5 or 10, bought the 10 and they fit great. Enough room for a warm sock. I’ve been looking for these for awhile, couldn’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Alison Shirk

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! I’m so happy I went Up a size. I normally Wear a 9.0. I had Read some other reviews and they said go up a half to a full size and I’m very happy that I went up to a size 10.0.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne R

customer_reviews.title: Cute, waterproof, surprisingly warm boots
customer_reviews.text: Cute, waterproof, surprisingly warm boots. I did have to order a size up from my usual. The top rubs against my upper ankle, so taller socks are necessary. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole35

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these. Very comfortable. I ordered a size up to wear with thicker socks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the way these look
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these look, but the fit is quite small and the hard back rubs against my legs when I walk. I went up a half size and they still felt too snug.
customer_reviews.author: Hillery

customer_reviews.title: Love them but they run small
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. I have been wearing them constantly. Nice lower profile. Order up at least a half size though. They run small.
customer_reviews.author: hilary

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! I have a heavier pair of Sorels that are too bulky except in snowy weather - these are great as a lighter weight duck boot for around town.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa G.

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! They are really comfortable. The only thing that I don't like is if i wear them with leggings, or some thin material on my legs, The back of my calf will get sore from the boot rubbing on them. Other than that, they're great!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Used shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these brand new and they showed up used. They were also on the small side.
customer_reviews.author: claire

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews and saw that most people sized up ...
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews and saw that most people sized up, so I ordered a half size up from my normal shoe size and they fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Very nice my wife loves them. Good deal. Fast shipper
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these look but the sizing is wrong. They run about a full size too small. Also don't walk on slippery surfaces, you'll go flying!
customer_reviews.author: S. Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Like the look and style
customer_reviews.text: Like the look and style. Normally wear a 9.5 to 10. Ordered a 10 and they are too small. Toes touching the end of the shoe even with sitting. Would recommend going up a full dize.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S Syde

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe but runs WAY small
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are nice once exchanged for the correct size. Normally wear women's size 8, needed to go up to a 10 in this shoe to get the right fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly G.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: just did not fit right..... and want a slip on, not lace up
customer_reviews.author: L. Haase

customer_reviews.title: Super cute boots
customer_reviews.text: Super cute boots. Really sturdy and good for weather. However these are not made for anyone with an arch in their foot! Even up a size they press down on the top of the foot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Usually wear a size 9-9.5 and ordered a 10, they fit perfect! Very good quality boots. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Runs small. Disappointed return policy is 30 days. Don't let life get in your way if you need to return or exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Fit way too small!!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10, and I ordered a 10. I put them on with super thin socks, and they were uncomfortably tight in the toes and top of my foot. As I walked a few steps, the top rubbed against my exposed ankle. Will be returning them asap. Part of the risk when you order shoes online, I guess! Definitely should have ordered up a size or 1.5 sizes up!!
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: The heel of this boot was leaning over... Have to send back... Was looking so forward to have the sorel boots and now I have to send them back.. Sad face
customer_reviews.author: Tamika R. Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat large
customer_reviews.text: I would size down about a half size. The leather is excellent and they keep my feet dry though.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: The boots were more snug than expected for a size ...
customer_reviews.text: The boots were more snug than expected for a size 10. Would advise to go up a half size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! Runs small. Normally wear a 9 and 10 is a snug fit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday boot
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and comfortable everyday boots. Perfect with bad weather days. Runs at least 1/2 size small depending on your feet. The width seems normal. Highly recommend if you get the sizing right.
customer_reviews.author: susanknh

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Had to exchange for size larger because the fit is snug. But Love Love Love these ! And return process easy and Fast!
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They have to be knock offs or imperfect. I returned
customer_reviews.author: Shannonm

product_meta.title: Sorel Women's N About Leather Rain Snow Boot
product_meta.description:
Wheel adjustment : Make up the wheel adjustment with the loosening and tightening of the axle nut ,the axle nut is self locking and often need not be adjusted , in case of removal or missing of the axle nut replace and so the lock nut must be tight against the base plate at all times

Sorel's cold weather footwear is ideal for those participating in active winter sports like snowmobiling or sledding, or for activities where maximum protection is required -- like all-season hunting or fishing, or simply going to work.
feature_bullets: Platform measures approximately 0.25 inches inches inches
Features 9 3/4 inches shaft circumference and heel height of 3 inches
Runs small, order a whole size up.
